name: Turtle Sword
description:
A game about saving Turtallia

This is my biggest game yet! Since I am new to game development, please report bugs and other problems.

Controls (explained in game also)

Move: WASD

Attack: Click

Credits:

Nathcra Games: Coding and Art

Sk0nk: Music

The font used is "Retro 5" from https://zekronz.itch.io/pixel-font-pack. I highly recommend checking it out!

Software Used:

Godot Engine 3.3.1

Aseprite 1.2.25

Beep Box

BFXR

Additional Notes:

The idea for this game came from my time playing the game "Enter the Gungeon", which was a dungeon crawler roguelike shooter game. I liked the game, but I wanted to put a twist to it, and make it more story driven, and use swords instead of super deadly guns. Sk0nk and I have tried our best to make Turtle Sword the best experience it can be, and I hope you like it as much as I do!

Nathcra Games: https://nathcra.itch.io/

If you want to check out Sk0nk, you can find him at https://sk0nk.itch.io/
